title: Frameworks in action: active learning
creator_credit: TV Ed Productions and Chris O'Rourke
brief_description: Three teachers show their approach to “active learning” in areas of primary English, postprimary Mathematics and Drama. This is part of a series showing teachers and parents practical responses to the Frameworks approach.
